country_decisions = {

######################################################################################################################
	use_missile_250_ai = { #AI can't use custom diplomatic actions
		potential = {
			#has_country_flag = show_all_dip_decision
            #has_country_flag = open_all_decision
			ai = yes
			NOT = { has_country_flag = stop_use_nuke }	
			OR = {
				check_variable = {
					which = missil_50
					value = 1
				}
				check_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = 1
				}
				check_variable = {
					which = missil_150
					value = 1
				}
				check_variable = {
					which = missil_250
					value = 1
				}
				check_variable = {
					which = missil_350
					value = 1
				}
				check_variable = {
					which = missil_500
					value = 1
				}
				check_variable = {
					which = missil_700
					value = 1
				}
				check_variable = {
					which = missil_1000
					value = 1
				}
				check_variable = {
					which = missil_1500
					value = 1
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = missile_cooldown }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = missile_cant_find_target_250 } 
			OR = {
				any_country = {
					ai = no
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_us
					}
				}
				has_country_flag = access_to_missile_1
				has_country_flag = access_to_missile_2
				AND = {
					any_known_country = {
					is_at_war = yes
					war_with = ROOT
					OR = {
						war_score = 15
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = missile_us
						}
					}
				}
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
				check_variable = {
					which = missil_250
					value = 1
				}
				any_province = {
				OR = {
					controlled_by = ROOT
					controller = {
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				has_building = mass_transit_system
			}
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = missile_cooldown }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = missile_cant_find_target_250 } 
			OR = {
				any_country = {
					ai = no
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_us
					}
				}
				has_country_flag = access_to_missile_1
				has_country_flag = access_to_missile_2
				AND = {
					any_known_country = {
					is_at_war = yes
					war_with = ROOT
					OR = {
						war_score = 15
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = missile_us
						}
					}
				}
				}
			}
			
		}
		effect = {
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
					reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_us
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						any_province = {
							OR = {
								controlled_by = ROOT
								controller = {
									is_subject_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							has_building = mass_transit_system
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 250
								}
							}
						}
						is_city = yes
					}
					set_province_flag = distance_city
						
				}
				
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { has_building = mass_transit_system has_province_flag = distance_city } }
					random_owned_province = {
						limit = { has_building = mass_transit_system has_province_flag = distance_city }
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = { 
									OR = {
										AND = {	
												check_variable = {
													which = defense_missile_lev
													value = 1
												}
											
											NOT = {
												check_variable = {
													which = defense_missile_lev
													value = 2
												}
											}
											
											ROOT = {
												NOT = {
													check_variable = {
														which = attack_missile_lev
														value = 2
													}
												}
											}
										}
										AND = {	
											check_variable = {
												which = defense_missile_lev
												value = 2
											}
										
											NOT = {
												check_variable = {
													which = defense_missile_lev
													value = 3
												}
											}
											ROOT = {
												NOT = {
													check_variable = {
														which = attack_missile_lev
														value = 3
													}
												}
											}
										}
										AND = {

												which = defense_missile_lev
												value = 3
											}
										
											NOT = {

													which = defense_missile_lev
													value = 4
												}

											ROOT = {
												NOT = {

														which = attack_missile_lev
														value = 4
													}
												}
											}
										}
										AND = {

												which = defense_missile_lev
												value = 4
											}
										
											NOT = {

													which = defense_missile_lev
													value = 5

					limit = { any_owned_province = { has_building = nuclear_plant has_province_flag = distance_city } }

							limit = { 
								OR = {
									has_building = fort_15th
									has_building = fort_16th
									has_building = fort_17th

								}

							else = {

					ROOT = {
						add_country_modifier = {

						}

					limit = { has_province_flag = distance_city }
					clr_province_flag = distance_city
				}
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					war_with = ROOT
					OR = {
						war_score = 25
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = missile_us
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						any_province = {
							country_or_subject_holds = ROOT
							OR = {
								has_building = road
								has_building = mass_transit_system

								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 250
								}
							}
						}
						is_city = yes
					}
					set_province_flag = distance_city
						
				}
				
				if = {
					limit = { any_owned_province = { has_building = mass_transit_system has_province_flag = distance_city } }

						limit = { has_building = mass_transit_system has_province_flag = distance_city }

							limit = {
								owner = { 
									OR = {
										AND = {	
												check_variable = {
													which = defense_missile_lev

													}
												}
											}
										}
										AND = {

												value = 3
											}

													}
												}
											}
										}
										AND = {

												which = defense_missile_lev
												value = 4
											}
										
											NOT = {
												check_variable = {
													which = defense_missile_lev
													value = 5
												}
											}
											ROOT = {
												NOT = {

					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_us
